本人應徵本公司之職務，若本公司須對本人做人事背景查核（Reference Check）時，本人茲同意授權本公司得連絡履歷表所列之推薦人或本人曾服務公司之人員，以查核本人現在或過去學經歷等資料之正確性與完整性。本公司為此得蒐集、處理與利用該查核後所獲取之本人個人資料，做為徵才評估之用。本人亦同意授權履歷表所列之推薦人或本人曾服務公司之人員，就本公司所徵詢之人事背景問題，得揭露或提供與本人有關之個人資料予本公司。投遞履歷時本人已詳盡閱讀並同意以上規定。

2. Related project management experience of production facilities and plant utilities > 5 years.

job_name: ★Just Kitchen 軒饌廚坊★【觀音店】內場_PT_廚務人員〔週休二日〕
cust_name: 軒饌廚坊股份有限公司
job_detail:
JustKitchen(軒饌廚坊) 是由一群資深台灣餐飲業經理人而創立，我們創造出新時代宅經濟中高效率的餐飲模式，結合中央子母廚房、虛擬餐飲品牌及外送服務，為雲端廚房2.0也是共享廚房的進階版，提供消費者更多元、優質的餐食體驗，將餐廳的外送美食搬上消費者的餐桌，輕鬆解決消費者三餐的煩惱。

JustKitchen 透過策略性選點，建立樞紐供應鏈系統，同時與餐飲同業合作，並以衛星廚房的概念擴大供應鏈的範圍，快速建立餐飲品牌、拓展規模，目標成為台灣首屈一指的外送美食品牌。


在這裡你可以，
1. 學習到中西式的多元菜系料理
2. 未來的餐飲形態模式，提早來卡位，讓未來的廚師生涯佔有一席之地
3. 新創品牌，新的模式，你可以有更多的發展，餐飲透過雲端走向世界

我們的工作內容有，
1. 依照客人的點單，準備不同餐盒所需要的食材，且協助製作高品質外帶美食
2. 嚴謹細心可確實依循標準作業流程執行。
3. 配料前置作業-依食譜規定之比例調配醬料、調理包 。
4. 日常廚房環境清理、設備維護及餐具整潔。 
5. 確保製作食品流程均符合食品衛生管理的規定。 
6. 負責洗、剝、削、切各種食材，以完成烹飪的前置工作。
7. 協助前台和外送司機核對訂單內容。

***此職缺為公司之區域招募職位，實際薪資會因應工作經驗而有所調整***


●2020年在台灣設置第1間佔地約 400坪的樞紐廚房和10間以上的衛星廚房，供應超過8個美食品牌的餐點。

●2021年在台灣有21間以上的衛星廚房，供應超過30個美食品牌的餐點，拓展餐廳企業至海外，第一站香港。

●2022年在台灣有30間以上的衛星廚房，供應超過50個美食品牌的餐點。
拓展餐廳企業至東南亞(香港、新加坡、馬來西亞、菲律賓、泰國等)及北美市場。香港已有第三家分店、新加坡已有一家分店。

Just Kitchen 在做什麼呢？  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=syfzttuNCI0
關於我們 : https://www.justkitchen.com/aboutus/
數位時代：https://www.bnext.com.tw/article/62349/justkitchen-meetstar
天下雜誌專訪：https://reurl.cc/z8E7yN
skill: 食材貯存管理, 食物製前準備
other:
1. 如有餐飲廚師證書者佳
2. 因營運需求，會需要配送便當至鄰近廠區；若熟悉3.5噸自排小貨車駕駛者，優先錄取

●2020年在台灣設置第1間佔地約 400坪的樞紐廚房和10間以上的衛星廚房，供應超過8個美食品牌的餐點。

●2021年在台灣有21間以上的衛星廚房，供應超過30個美食品牌的餐點，拓展餐廳企業至海外，第一站香港。

●2022年在台灣有30間以上的衛星廚房，供應超過50個美食品牌的餐點。
拓展餐廳企業至東南亞(香港、新加坡、馬來西亞、菲律賓、泰國等)及北美市場。香港已有第三家分店、新加坡已有一家分店。

 1.筆試及面試。

cust_name: 三福氣體股份有限公司
job_detail:
PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES

1. Ensure to comply with AP and local safety, health and environment standard, fulfill the mandatory safety requirement and activities: safety training, safety meeting, BSP (APT, JSA etc) and all other requirements by AP EH&S and local regulation.
2. Monitor the serviceability of plant equipment and facilities and ensure they adhere to safety, housekeeping and environmental requirements. 
3. Responsible for all rotation and static mechanical equipment inclusive of compressor, pumps, valve and other mechanical equipments, such as: centrifugal and reciprocating compressors, cryogenic pumps, heater exchangers, pipelines, centrifugal expanders, varying from facilities.
4. Response to maintenance requirements that could be scheduled or unscheduled/emergency jobs, on 24/7 base, prompt response to requests for assistance and putting in the time and effort to meet our customer’s expectations.
5. To be familiar with all equipments in plants, maintain all mechanical equipments accurate documents integrity and equipment history database reachable.
6. Provide hand-on technical skills at the troubleshooting and all related maintenance work or supporting work responsible.
7. Perform preventive maintenance work and support to implement  MI work, such as SAP PM01-03 tasks, troubleshooting, repair for all responsibly equipment.
8. Coordinate or assist of supervision the contractor’s work in the facility or shop to guarantee safety and quality and reliability.
9. Provide technical reports through the specified datasheet or checklist in the system (ERP, SAP) or other model required. 
10. Implement CI (continuous improvement) saving activity, idea tracker provision.
11. Follow to improve equipment’s reliability and focus on CoNC.
12. Reporting-Time entry weekly, and prepare technical reports either written or through entries into the resource management system to maintain accurate documentations on the plants, and to provide information for others in the organization to carry out their responsibilities effectively.
13. Business travel within region is required based on the actual need.
14. Support CoNC root cause investigation and action plan.

cust_name: 伍仕電子股份有限公司
job_detail:
Wurth Electronic is an global electronic manufacturer focusing on components for industry. The position we are opening is located in our brand new logistic center which aim to support all of our sales in Asia-Pacific as well as Americas.

As Export, your role will be to insure that our product are able to be deliver to various countries in the define area. You will be responsible on updating and adapting our local processes to keep up the highest service level for our customers.

You will be directly responsible for few key accounts and will work closely with the warehouse and supply chain office. With an average of 300 shipment per day, you will have to be well organized and focusing on each details.

As export specialist, you will be in charge of verifying and updating the HS code to be align with Taiwan law.

We will also need you to be participating to international brainstorming to improve our global response to customs, export regulation and trade challenge.

3. Provides and drive QC method deployment on site regarding quality tools (such as FMEA, RCA, SPC, Control Chart) to help manufactured products in quality control, 
drives the site investigation of quality issues and deviation and the execution of product quality improvements through preventive or corrective actions.  
4. Manage and coordinate process and CQC analyzers and backup analyzers across sites per QMS measurement system analysis (calibration, GR&R and long-term stability) and handling of any nonconforming events
5. Manage PM, acceptance test, supplier audit/management and critical spare parts for CQC analyzers across sites.

cust_name: 三福氣體股份有限公司
job_detail:
-管理和監督司機團隊安全並及時地執行計劃/排定的產品運送行程。在日常物流活動中與調度員討論及合作。確保及時將任何駕駛員或車隊情況正確傳達給調度。
- 計劃和管理駕駛員的工作時間表，以確保駕駛時間管理計劃內有效執行計劃/預定的行程，並確保司機遵守駕駛安全規範。
-領導和進行日常駕駛員溝通（討論安全、道路/車隊狀況以及客戶的任何特殊交付要求），以確保高度的安全意識和客戶關注。
- 確保在 LB Shell 和 MOBY 中正確關閉所有配送行程交易記錄，以促進每個行程關閉流程的及時後續作業。
-確保司機提交的車輛狀況報告（VCR）和司機觀察報告（DOR）分別及時轉發給車輛維修、業務團隊和工程服務處，以進行後續作業。
- 與調度和車輛維修計劃員協調，以促進及時的車隊維護（PM 或校正）和檢查，以確保完全符合相關的法規/許可要求。如果需要，請諮詢車輛維修主管。
- 與調度和駕駛訓練師緊密合作，幫助安排司機按計劃參加所需的培訓（包括複訓）。
-按照部門經理和主管的指示負責執行任何其他分派任務。
- 確保工廠和客戶現場能夠允許司機在安全和品質要求下進行提送貨。
language: 英文:聽 /略懂、說 /略懂、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
skill: 車故╱貨故問題處理能力, 運輸路線規劃管理
other: 具大貨車駕照佳

若具備以下兩種實戰與產業經驗者將是我們找尋志同道合的人才

參與幕僚系統工作分析營運狀況
協助總經理推動策略方針與輔導落實執行

分析與營運管理面

1. 經營分析：營業收入與成本效益分析、經營報告編制、經營策略跟進執行

實務與戰略面

1.參與ESG永續專案開發與企劃執行撰寫。
2.進生產線落實精實管理之奧義
3.協助設定各部門年度目標與預算編列
4.參與轉型制度的推行與各部們主管配合實踐

*曾參與幕僚工作或戰略改革經驗者尤佳
*具備工業管理以與會計和財務背景尤佳

job_detail:
RESPONSIBILITIES:  
•	Work directly with the business users to guide complex projects and develop innovative solutions
•	Ensure that best available solutions are implemented to satisfy business needs and serve as a liaison between the technical IT team and Business users.
•	Maintain, resolve and enhance IT solutions that support Isola business processes. Assist in documenting business processes and create presentations and diagrams in support of enhancement projects/initiatives. Develop functional specifications for software change requests. Perform testing of SAP changes and business processes
•	Focus on business process improvement re-engineering efforts and technology enablement
•	Facilitate blueprinting and design sessions and document functional requirements
•	Solicit feedback and comments from senior analysts and IT managers on proposed solutions and make necessary adjustments.
•	Serve as first/second level of support for IT Helpdesk for PP/MM/QM master data issues and triage the tickets.  Responsible for production support which may include overnight and weekend system monitoring on a rotational basis.
•	Provides timely status updates to IT Management and key business users.
•	Effectively interacts with all levels of employees as well as outside customers and vendors if required.
•	Keep self-updated on SAP roadmap and technologies in Operations domain.
•	Perform testing to ensure proper functionality of SAP changes/enhancements
•	Participate in global projects and other cross functional tasks, for continuous improvement securing global standards and harmonization

Requirement：
•	Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology or related business field required
•	Minimum 8 years of SAP ECC experience
•	Strong knowledge of SAP ECC PP (Production Planning) and MM (Materials Management) Modules are desired
•	Ability to demonstrate a well-rounded understanding of the integration points within SAP across modules and be able to support integrated processes.
•	Ability to work in a fast-pace environment and multi-task. 
•	Knowledge in Variant Configuration (LO-VC) with configured materials is an advantage, eg. classification system, object dependencies, variant tables/profiles
•	Knowledge of SAP PP (Production Planning).
•	Knowledge of SAP QM (Quality Management) is a plus.
•	Good knowledge of ABAP Workbench and able to code in ABAP is a plus as well.
•	Excellent verbal/written communication in both Chinese & English as well as interpersonal skills at all levels  
•	Strong analytical, communication, interpersonal skills

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:
Design, lead, and execute effective learning programs and talent development strategies across the company

•	Oversees planning, prioritization and development core training and development initiatives, ensures the initiatives are consistent with the business strategy and needs
•	Design framework and develop architecture for learning programs
•	Design L&D programs and methods that can be used to enable the achievement of objectives and organizational change.
•	Make sure the available resources for a successful implementation.
•	Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of L&D programs with a view to continued improvement.
•	Regularly review rules, tools, development actions, training programs to continuously meet the needs of the business.

Formulated the top-level design of talent training according to the company's HR Strategy, including but not limited to Training System (courses, trainers, processes), Succession System and Evaluation System
•	Improve the training system in Isola University, including courses development process and train the trainer process.
•	Cooperate with leaders and HRBPs to recognize successors and high potential talents for identified key/critical roles.
•	Roll out the Individual Develop Plan for Successors and high potential talents, and review what are their needs.
•	Develop long-term learning programs for successors or high potentials
•	Pilot the development of management training programs for key talents

Create a culture of continuous development and also monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of L&D programs
•	Formulate stakeholder / user engagement strategies along the way to optimize results
•	Drive employee engagement improvement and help leaders to build up an engaged team.
•	Build a more relaxed and enjoyable way of learning.

Qualifications:
•	Requires a bachelor’s degree HR Management or related discipline.
•	Demonstrate strong experience (a minimum of 7 years required) in a range of learning delivery methods and blended learning approaches including facilitator-led workshops, eLearning, webinars, interactive tools / games, and coaching / mentoring sessions
•	Demonstrate strong experience in talent development, focusing on career and succession development
•	Proven track records of learning solutions/projects development and implementation. Samples of work are required.
•	Stay tuned with the latest and innovative learning solutions and be able to immediately apply
•	Strong project management skill
•	Deliver learning programs in bilingual language (English and Mandarin)
•	Experience in building or rolling out a university in MNC
•	Excited in creating exceptional and creative learning experiences and helping others succeed
•	Passionate about learning and continuous self-development

cust_name: 新技術供應鏈與物流股份有限公司
job_detail:
本職位是新技術供應鏈與物流-智慧物流中心的核心成員。

6. 維護資料庫管理系統，確保資料的安全性。
7. 熟悉WMS, TMS 與 自動化系統優先考慮。
8, 有AWS 實施與使用經驗優先考慮.

cust_name: 新技術供應鏈與物流股份有限公司
job_detail:
本職位是新技術供應鏈與物流-智慧物流中心的成員。 
歡迎有志之士加入.共同建立台灣最先進的智慧物流體系.

1. 規劃及檢討公司會計作業流程，並覆核各項會計作業，以符合財會及稅務之規定。
2. 定期核閱財務報表，並針對異常項目進行分析檢討。
3. 解決並督導關係企業帳務處理及覆核其財務報表。
4. 檢討每月各營運單位之營運結果、預算執行績效報告。
5. 提供並分析其他管理決策所需之管理會計資訊。
6. 覆核並督導編製關係企業三書表，以因應法令要求。
7. 按期向經營階層提出經會計師簽證之查核報告及年報等報告書。
8. 覆核定期及不定期公告與向主管機關申報之各項資訊。
9. 決議與覆核各項資金調度作業之執行。
10. 依據公司營運與資金需求狀況，擬定各項籌資方案。
11. 覆核公司各項稅務申報及問題處理。
12. 覆核並督導編製股東可扣抵稅額帳戶以因應股東申報所得需求。
13. 了解租稅規定與變化，藉以規劃公司整體稅務問題。
14. 審核並彙總公司年度預算。
15. 籌劃及執行公司年度股東會。
skill: 財務報表製作, 財務報表分析, 結帳作業與帳務處理, 會計核算和帳務處理
other: 熟悉委外物流的業務優先考慮.
